bug.author: mr-bjerre
bug.summary: Include Tensorboard in Trainer Package Template
bug.description: In <denchmark-link:https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/cloudml-samples/tree/master/cloudml-template>Trainer Package Template</denchmark-link> it would be valuable if it was optimized for running tensorboard as well when running truly locally. If I run the training now and then run Tensorboard pointing to the job dir then I don't see the full output. The following snapshot is from a run on <denchmark-link:https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/cloudml-samples/tree/master/cloudml-template/examples/census-classification>census</denchmark-link> . <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16841792/44256356-2db45b00-a209-11e8-8c3e-427c6d270648.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Hi! Thanks for the feedback and I'll see what I can do to make that happen.
We have added a new template that should make it happen, I tested and it works fine
